name: KIMURO SOLUTIONS (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The leader in India for Real Estate Data, Analytics & Workflow Solutions
Propstack is India's leading Real Estate data, analytics and workflow solutions platform and was developed in response to a need for greater market transparency. Our data is the most important part of our business and we conduct expansive, ongoing research to produce and maintain the largest and most comprehensive database of Real Estate information. We are also the largest private repository of registered sale, lease and mortgage information in India.
Propstack provides predictive and prescriptive analytics based on our deep data which forms the core of our clients efficient and smart decision making. Every data point is meticulously researched and verified by our teams. Post verification of this granular data, our team of analysts provide trends & insights through our cutting-edge analytics suite. Our suite of online services enables clients to analyze, interpret and gain unmatched insight on commercial property values, market conditions and current availabilities.
Propstack is relevant to anyone who has an interest in Real Estate and we are proud to serve the largest funds, investors, corporates, developers, brokers and lenders.
name: Propstack

idea:
Our lives have significantly improved with the ease that technology affords us, however, our living space itself, in other words our home, or even our work place, remains largely untouched by the power of transformation that technology has brought into other aspects of our life. We also understood that the Indian interior design market is dotted with interruptions owing to its disorganized nature causing the customer to feel apprehensive over the process and end product. We at SPACIFII wanted to change that.

SPACIFII intends to transform this industry with its technology backed solutions, ensuring any pre & post construction commitments are always honoured.
name: SPACIFII HOME DECORS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We started bootstrapped with our own funding and have build a consumer focused diamond jewellery portal offering customisation to the customer to the fullest level with complete transparency in pricing and contents being offered with deliveries across India and overseas. We were the first company offering maximum permutation and combinations giving different price points to the customers for any design that they wish to order with us. We offer the lowest Diamond pricing online. We are in business for more than 3 years but due to lack of deep pockets havent spent lot of money on marketing and trying to focus on building customers and growing gradually.
name: Jewel Hub Pvt ltd
